meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of classicism.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a classicistic sculpture from ancient times.
meanings.sent2: Her classicistic taste in art leaned towards elegant and timeless pieces.
meanings.sent3: The classicistic painting seemed to come to life and winked at the viewers.
meanings.sent4: The classicistic architecture of the building stood tall like a symbol of tradition.
meanings.sent5: The classicistic design of the vase was so detailed that every curve told a story.

meanings.sent1: The artist's classicistic approach to painting focused on balance and harmony.
meanings.sent2: The room was decorated with classicistic furniture that exuded sophistication.
meanings.sent3: The classicistic outfit she wore made her look like a character from a historical movie.
meanings.sent4: His classicistic music composition transported the listeners back in time.
meanings.sent5: The classicistic dance performance was a graceful tribute to the past.

meanings.definition: Emphasizing the principles of ancient Greek and Roman art and literature.
meanings.sent1: The classicistic play was filled with references to Greek mythology.
meanings.sent2: The classicistic columns of the temple reflected the grandeur of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The classicistic poem humorously mixed Roman and Greek characters in modern situations.
meanings.sent4: Her classicistic storytelling style painted vivid pictures of ancient times.
meanings.sent5: The classicistic novel took readers on a journey through the myths of Greece and Rome.
